abstract: The company said Colleen Goggins, 56, who has been overseeing one of the company’s three major divisions, would retire in March.
snippet: The company said Colleen Goggins, 56, who has been overseeing one of the company’s three major divisions, would retire in March.
lead_paragraph: A longtime senior executive at Johnson & Johnson in charge of the consumer products division is leaving the company early next year, signaling a shake-up after a troubling series of recalls, including of children’s Tylenol, tarnished the company’s reputation in the last year.

headline.main: Chief of Unit With Recalls to Exit J.&J.
headline.print_headline: Chief of Unit With Recalls To Exit J.&J.

byline.original: By Natasha Singer and Reed Abelson

abstract: Hedge fund managers who closed their firms are opening new funds, and in some cases promising to make previous investors whole before taking performance fees.
snippet: Hedge fund managers who closed their firms are opening new funds, and in some cases promising to make previous investors whole before taking performance fees.
lead_paragraph: James J. Pallotta, a legend of the hedge fund industry, is calling a do-over, Julie Creswell writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: Hedge Fund Managers Set Up for Next Acts

abstract: Johnson & Johnson, the U.S. health products company, said Friday that it was in advanced talks to offer for the 82 percent of Crucell, a Dutch biopharmaceutical firm, that it does not already own, in what would be a 1.75 billion euro deal.
snippet: Johnson & Johnson, the U.S. health products company, said Friday that it was in advanced talks to offer for the 82 percent of Crucell, a Dutch biopharmaceutical firm, that it does not already own, in what would be a 1.75 billion euro deal.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson, the American health products company, said Friday that it was in advanced talks to bid for the 82 percent of Crucell, a Dutch biopharmaceutical firm, that it does not already own, in what would be a 1.75 billion euro ($2.3 billion) deal.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson Mulling $2.3 Billion Crucell Bid
